ADD_EXECUTABLE(example1 example1.c)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(example1 phigs
                      ${OPENGL_LIBRARY} ${X11_LIBRARY} ${XMU_LIBRARY} m)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(example2 example2.c)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(example2 phigs
                      ${OPENGL_LIBRARY} ${X11_LIBRARY} ${XMU_LIBRARY} m)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(example3 example3.c)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(example3 phigs
                      ${OPENGL_LIBRARY} ${X11_LIBRARY} ${XMU_LIBRARY} m)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(example4 example4.c)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(example4 phigs
                      ${OPENGL_LIBRARY} ${X11_LIBRARY} ${XMU_LIBRARY} m)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(example5 example5.c)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(example5 phigs
                      ${OPENGL_LIBRARY} ${X11_LIBRARY} ${XMU_LIBRARY} m)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(example6 example6.c)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(example6 phigs
                      ${OPENGL_LIBRARY} ${X11_LIBRARY} ${XMU_LIBRARY} m)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(example7 example7.c)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(example7 phigs
                      ${OPENGL_LIBRARY} ${X11_LIBRARY} ${XMU_LIBRARY} m)
